name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler
storyline:
Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!
Play over 100 challenging puzzles spread across a myriad of colorful worlds, constantly introducing surprising new mechanics to keep you delighted until the end.
Get behind Billy's behind, possibly the best one you’ve ever seen (on a cube) and watch him wiggle it to our super funky soundtrack you’ll bump up the volume for.
summary: Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!
